citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on July 19,
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking at the doors of the facility, and calling to the phone
number provided. Contact was made with facility representative who said no one would be available to complete the
inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on July 19, 
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking at the doors of the facility, and calling to the phone 
number provided. Contact was made with facility representative who said no one would be available to complete the 
inspection.  
 
 Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
